I found a solution that worked for me :)
So:

1) Install hselite and do not open right now
2) Paste the hosts
3) Now run & connect it
4) Open a browser page and open 2 pages (e.g. google and youtube) to determinate the hotspot shield to redirect you to trial period activation. Now close the browser. I know it sound so stupid, but for me works. You need to do it to avoid: http://img138.imageshack.us/img138/6392/hselite.png
5) Now restart your pc
6) Open browser and download an ad block (for firefox i suggest ad block plus and ad block for google chrome, just google it ad block plus or open chrome store if you using google chrome)
7) Now run hselite & connect, ad block will block the ad content which redirect you to trial period start page (sure blocked by hosts file, but the page will be open as offline)
8) Enjoy it :) and sorry for my bad english :D
